title: 71 perches Land Close To Kalpitiya Kite Lagoon
details:
Land Ref: Sarj-71

This is a 71 perch property located less than 500 meters from the Kalpitiya kite lagoon.

The land is ideally situated minutes from the Kalpitiya kite surfing lagoon and close to many other tourist resorts.

Land is ideal for personal holiday home or any other tourism project.

The land comes with -

- Electricity
- Drinking Water
- Good Road Access
- Fully fenced
- Clear Deed And Title

Asking price LKR 100,000/perch

If interested please contact us on 07777 33823 for further details.

Thanks for looking :)
